      • filterVars

        public static NonExistentClass filterVars(java.lang.String $receiver,
                                          java.util.Map<?,?> parameters)

        Filters the target string substituting each key by its value. The keys format is: #{key} and all occurrences are replaced by the supplied value.

        If a variable does not have a parameter, it is left as it is.

      • ansi

        public static java.lang.String ansi(AnsiColor fg,
                                    AnsiColor bg,
                                    co.there4.hexagon.util.AnsiEffect fxs)

        Creates an ANSI sequence composed by a list of commands (colors, effects, etc.).

        A call with no effect neither color generates an ANSI reset.
